dcterms:creator: T. Deruyttere
S. Vandenhende
D. Grujicic
L. Van Gool
M.F. Moens
dcterms:description: The Talk2Car dataset contains images from the nuScenes dataset annotated with natural language commands for self-driving cars, bounding boxes of scene objects, and the bounding box of the object referred to in a command. It includes 11,959 commands across 9,217 images taken in various weather and time conditions.
dcterms:title: Talk2Car

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A.C. Berg
T.L. Berg
dcterms:description: The RefCOCO dataset is based on the MS-COCO dataset and contains 142,209 referring expressions for 50,000 objects. It is split into training, validation, and testing sets, with expressions averaging 3.61 words.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO
